Text.Name: GodPractice_GodPowerEffect
Text.Desc: As one's Divinity increases, the character can exert more control over divine power and thus become more powerful, while at the same time the Mood multiplier is increased as well.

Text.Name: GodPractice_GodPowerEffect_A
Text.Desc: Actual effects for a Divinity value of 0-30.

Text.Name: GodPractice_GodPowerEffect_B
Text.Desc: Actual effects for a Divinity value of 30-100.

Text.Name: GodPractice_Xinzhai
Text.Desc: Temporarily reduce the impact of emotions on Mood through Mind Fasting. The more time it takes in Mind Fasting, the longer its effects persist after completion. Your Mental State will not change for the duration of the Mind Fasting.

Text.Name: GodPractice_GodLike
Text.Desc: Temporarily adjust Divinity to 99.99% within 300 seconds, and permanently gain 1% Divinity after it finishes.
